_source.short_desc: GoBrunch is a Virtual Event platform with a unique interface that drives positive engagement among your participants. No installation.
_source.long_desc: GoBrunch is a versatile Virtual Event platform with a unique interface that drives positive engagement among your participants. No installation is required. Create your webinar or virtual event, turn on your camera, share your screen, share your videos, broadcast other presenters and record. Much like an in-person event, you can have multiple rooms taking place simultaneously with different facilitators assigned to each session. Get started and make your events more fun and interactive.
_source.pricing_details: The Gourmet Version starts with USD 9.99 and allows you to record, add your logo, get a frequency report, create more breakout sessions and play YouTube Videos. If you choose the Prime Chef  - USD 29.99 you'll be able to customize the backgrounds, create events up to 409 attendees and assign multiple organizers. The Enterprise version allows you to create sub-accounts and get a custom sub-domain.
_source.target_audience: Professional trainers, educators, entrepreneurs, small and medium businesses, schools, universities, training centers and associations.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: With Cvent, you can easily create better virtual events with integrated solutions that maximize your virtual event impact.
related_products.features: Create better virtual events with Cvent! Use our virtual event marketing and management platform to get the most out of your online events. Our powerful and flexible tools will help you drive attendance, process registrations, and capture actionable insights. By using Cvent for your virtual events, you'll have all the data you need to prove and improve the ROI of your full events program in one consolidated and comprehensive platform.

related_products.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
related_products.features: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.

related_products.short_desc:
Host and manage virtual events with interactive video, web, and audio
for large audiences around the world.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans Events, a globally trusted live video streaming solution, is
an easy-to-use virtual event platform for keynotes, thought leadership, and brand awareness. 

Invite customers into a virtualized venue to strengthen community with a modernized alternative to worn-out webinars. BlueJeans Events combine the collaborative features of a meeting platform with the scalability of a broadcast ? connecting presenters with attendees through an interactive, immersive video experience.

related_products.short_desc: vFairs is the leading virtual events platform, helping organizations of all sizes host best-in-class events online.
related_products.features: vFairs is the world's leading virtual events platform, helping organizations of all sizes take their events online. Featuring an intuitive 3D virtual venue and expansive features that help you create a custom virtual experience for your audience. Access fully functional webinars, virtual exhibit booths, networking features, content sharing, and more. Every vFairs event is supported by our renowned customer service team, who's there to help every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features: Eventzilla offers a powerful registration, mobile app, webinar and live streaming platform for a complete suite of solutions that are ready for virtual, hybrid or live event formats. Works perfect for conferences, classes, webinars, virtual events, fundraisers, training, & sports events. Eventzilla has everything you need to create a beautiful on-brand event website, publish event agenda, accept registrations, process payments, Livestream content, manage attendees, and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: Hopin is an all-in-one events platform via which attendees can learn, interact, and connect with people from anywhere in the world.
related_products.features: Hopin is an all-in-one events platform with which organizers can create, host and manage live events for up to 100,000 attendees. Hopin's web based virtual venue connects distributed communities, companies, and friends with live video, chat and networking features. Attendees can learn, interact, and connect with people from anywhere in the world.

related_products.short_desc: Influitive Virtual EventHub is a great virtual event solution for companies looking to offer an unforgettable experience to attendees.
related_products.features: Influitive Virtual EventHub is a great virtual event solution for companies looking to offer an unforgettable experience to attendees. Combining very customizable branding, a built-in invitation system, high-quality video and discussions, and game mechanics you won't find in any other virtual event solution.

related_products.short_desc: ON24 provides digital experiences and webcasting for corporate communications and demand generation via a cloud-based SaaS application.
related_products.features: ON24 is on a mission to redefine how organizations engage with their audiences, powering interactive, data-rich webinars and event experiences that help people connect on a more human level and make smarter business decisions. Through ON24, marketers can create Live, On Demand and Personalized Engagement, turn it into actionable intelligence and integrate it across their operations. Informed by over a billion engagement minutes, marketers drive more revenue from ON24 than any other channel.

related_products.short_desc: Create an immersive experience with Airmeet and bring your global audiences together. Increase engagement and improve event ROI.
related_products.features:
Airmeet is a simple, intuitive, and easy-to-use platform that allows instant edits to event details. Spend time hosting events and not managing your event platform. Say goodbye to complex, hard-to-navigate UI.

Capture attention & build brand recall with branded stages, lounges, booths & more. Drive registrations with custom event landing pages.

6500+ brands like Walmart, Volvo, Accenture, HackerRank, University of Toronto host thousands of events every month on Airmeet across the globe.

related_products.short_desc: A virtual event without networking and engagement is just a webinar. We bridge that gap with an all-in-one virtual event platform.
related_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is driving virtual event success for thousands of event organizers. Webex Events is an all-in-one virtual event platform that allows organizations to easily host engaging virtual event experiences that drive results. Choose from various features to craft engaging virtual event experiences, including but not limited to TV-like live streams, advanced engagement tools like moderated Q&A, polling, gamification, and centralized content for live and on-demand experiences.

similar_products.short_desc: We Create Amazing Virtual Events with stunning design, spectacular engagement, obsessive support.
similar_products.features:
Communique is the global leader in virtual events since 2001 (20 years). Choose from our easy Event Hub Live platform for small events or our high-powered 3D virtual event platform to knock the socks off your attendees.

Both platforms offer an abundance of engagement tools to keep their attention and create an experience to remember.

similar_products.short_desc: ConveneAGM is the AGM solution that enables you to conduct virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings in compliance to existing guidelines.
similar_products.features: ConveneAGM is the end-to-end eAGM conference solution designed to conduct engaging virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings. Organizations can hold a real-time AGM broadcast where shareholders can register, vote on resolutions, send proxy forms, and participate in live Q&A. It streamlines the AGM process and requirements into an all-in-one platform to aid secretaries, scrutineers, and share registrars. ConveneAGM is developed by Azeus, a CMMI Level 5 company and an expert in process efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: SpotMe is a virtual event solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events.
similar_products.features: SpotMe is a virtual event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events. All event management, video production and app building tools are included, directly from your browser. The solution is suitable for simple webinars to sophisticated events with high production values. Forrester and G2 say SpotMe is a leader due to high engagement capabilities and deep customization and flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: A virtual event without networking and engagement is just a webinar. We bridge that gap with an all-in-one virtual event platform.
similar_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is driving virtual event success for thousands of event organizers. Webex Events is an all-in-one virtual event platform that allows organizations to easily host engaging virtual event experiences that drive results. Choose from various features to craft engaging virtual event experiences, including but not limited to TV-like live streams, advanced engagement tools like moderated Q&A, polling, gamification, and centralized content for live and on-demand experiences.

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 virtual event management software that increases your productivity and ROI-not your stress levels & Aspirin budget. Designed for virtual & in-person events with hybrid capabilities, we provide a platform that creates a streamlined experience for your attendees from start to finish. Includes: Unlimited events & registrations, built-in analytics, free integrations (video providers, CRM, payments, etc.) intuitive website+email marketing tools, & our world-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

similar_products.short_desc: Breakroom is the next evolution in virtual events - a fully customizable 3D environment built for all your virtual requirements.
similar_products.features: Breakroom is the next evolution in virtual events - a fully customizable 3D environment built for all your virtual requirements. Breakroom's virtual events platform allows you to connect with audiences in a whole new way. Bridge the gap between physical and online events with a 3D virtual events solution for conferences, networking events, exhibitions, and more, creating a unique and immersive digital experience to engage your audience.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy live streaming, virtual exhibitor booths, interactive networking, breakout sessions, registration, chat & polling.
similar_products.features: A powerful but affordable all-in-one virtual event platform with 24/7 live customer support. The platform offers robust virtual event hosting features including ticket sales, live streaming, live chat & polling, virtual exhibitor booths, breakout sessions, A.I. powered networking, gamification, and more. Whether hosting an event for 100 people or 100,000+ Accelevents will allow you to create a virtual experience that your attendees remember.

similar_products.short_desc: Goldcast is the only all-in-one online event/webinar platform that turns events into revenue.
similar_products.features:
Goldcast is used by B2B marketers to create engaging virtual events that are more like Netflix show experiences and drive revenue using rich post-event insights. Customers like Drift, Microsoft GitHub, Toast use Goldcast right from single session event to hosting large scale conferences with their prospects and customers. 
In addition to providing a rich attendee experience, Goldcast provides granular analytics that help sales and customer success teams drive pipeline through the event.

similar_products.short_desc: Turnkey solution for virtual video chat events and video conferencing.
similar_products.features: Shindig is a turnkey solution for video chat events. The browser-based tech and mobile app enable a host to give a presentation or conduct a panel discussion in front of an online audience of thousands. Hosts can share the stage for face-to-face interactions with audience members before the entire gathering or video chat with participants privately. Audience members are also able to network, discuss and socialize with one another in their own self-initiated private video chats.

similar_products.short_desc: Hybrid and standalone virtual events, including live and simulated live sessions, exhibitors, sponsor options, full support, secure
similar_products.features: Hybrid and Standalone virtual events that include live and simulated live sessions, on-demand sessions, exhibitor booths, interactive chat options, and gamification.  Full support, for attendees and show organizers, is included.  Attendee-paid and free events supported, with options for freemium events as well.  Includes industry-unique sponsorship options to assist in the monetization of your events. Single- and multi-event packages available.  Unique customization options, scalable & secure

similar_products.short_desc: Hubilo is the virtual event platform trusted by the world's top event professionals & enterprises.
similar_products.features: Hubilo is the virtual event platform built for the world's most important event: Yours. Trusted by the world's top event professionals, Hubilo offers 24/7 live customer support, designated client experience managers that offer white-glove support before, during, and after your events, as well as a vast array of engagement and analytics tools. Get your free demo of the platform today!

similar_products.short_desc: Glisser is an award-winning technology platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events.
similar_products.features:
Glisser is an award-winning platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events. We enable companies to power engaging event experiences by offering a ready-to-go event platform and a completely customizable solution that lets you take control of the look and feel of your virtual events.

Glisser Elements is our platform distilled down to its purest form. Our virtual and hybrid event Software Development Kits (SDKs) allow you to create unique virtual environments, inside your own websites.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Conference software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Conference tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Conference software automates promotion, registration, and organization of live or online conferences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Video Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Video Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Video Conferencing software allows businesses to host remote meetings and conferences through two-way video and audio display. This type of software can be used as a communication method with employees, online conference attendees, clients, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Webinar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Webinar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Webinar software allows companies to conduct and distribute interactive live and recorded promotional or educational video presentations to existing or potential customers.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across a multitude of systems.
related_products.features: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across everything from your mobile and desktop devices to telephones and conference room systems. Special features include cloud and local recording with transcripts and multi-user annotation capabilities via screen share.  Easy access with one click, chat across platforms and share files all with encrypted, compliant settings for extra security.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
related_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
related_products.features: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

related_products.short_desc: vFairs elevates your video conferencing to an unforgettable attendee experience to let you connect & engage with audiences at scale.
related_products.features: vFairs elevates your video conferencing to an unforgettable attendee experience. Webinars can integrate with any webcasting tools, including Zoom, Vimeo, YouTube and WebEx, to provide a fully immersive, value-driven experience. Host webinars that keep attendees engaged with live translation, AI-powered transcription, and interactive features like Q&A, polling and interactive whiteboard features. Connect & engage with audiences at scale within an intuitive, immersive 3D virtual conference venue.

related_products.short_desc: Livestorm is an end-to-end video engagement platform that enables you to connect, engage, and capture actionable insights in one place.
related_products.features:
Livestorm enables powerful, yet pain-free video engagements at scale. 

Our end-to-end video engagement platform enables organizations to create professional video engagements that can be easily managed in one place.

It's a browser-based platform that doesn't require a download, or setup. You can use Livestorm for on-demand, live, or pre-recorded meetings or events.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
similar_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: A web conferencing solution that empowers you to host interactive online meeting, video conferencing and organize engaging webinars.
similar_products.features: Zoho Meeting is a robust web conferencing solution built for online meeting and webinar needs. It is completely browser-based and attendees don't need to download any application to attend a meeting or webinar. Keep your meetings handy using the desktop plugin for Windows, Linux and Mac, iOS app, android app, Google Chrome extension, Firefox extension, embed widget and calendar integrations. Embed webinar registration, polls, Q&A, allow to talk, recording, in-depth analytics, etc

similar_products.short_desc: TrainerCentral is an online course platform, with an in-build video conferencing functionality to host webinars and live workshops.
similar_products.features: Turn learning into a two-way street by simulating an in-person environment with a host of engagement features and tools. TrainerCentral's virtual classroom streams your training videos in HD, engaging your remote learners like you're standing right in front of them.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud based SaaS Video Collaboration Platform - Join a secure meeting with flawless HD video, audio, screen sharing, recording, & more.
similar_products.features: InstaVC provides a complete suite of Could based SaaS Video Collaboration platforms across all industry verticals to cater to the unique requirements of each sector. Create inclusive, video-first meetings with HD Video, Audio clarity and implement an ultimate productive virtual meeting experience with this impeccable video collaboration solution.

similar_products.short_desc: The most powerful all-in-one webinar platform used by over 50,000 professionals across 40 different industries.
similar_products.features:
Reach more people from anywhere in the world with the most powerful all-in-one webinar platform. Host events, teach classes, broadcast to your team, and increase your sales and attendance with the only webinar system that produces a complete live stream event from registration to replay. 

WebinarJam has the most features at the best price. Trusted by over 50,000 professionals across 40 different industries.

similar_products.short_desc: The Pexip Build video platform can shape, enhance, and personalize your end-users experience.
similar_products.features:
Pexip Build
The video platform to transform your patient, customer, and client experiences.
Discover how Pexip Build helps you create customized, integrated, and user-friendly video engagement with consumers. Pexip is more than just a meeting solution. The Pexip Build video platform can shape, enhance, and personalize your end-users experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Stay in control of your classified meeting data and trust Pexip to keep your organization connected.
similar_products.features:
Secure Spaces by Pexip
Discover Pexip for Secure Communications and Pexip for Business Continuity, video meeting solutions that keep your organization connected on a reliable and secure platform. 

Stay in control of your classified meeting data and trust Pexip to keep your organization connected. Flexible deployment methods including on-premise and works in an air-gapped environment. Maintain full transparency of video meeting data. Experience superior audio and video. Ensure 100% reliability.

similar_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
similar_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Jumbo is a fully integrated and customizable virtual events and live streaming software tool.
similar_products.features: Jumbo builds the world's most customizable live streaming and video platforms. Our platforms are fully integrated and tailor made for your brand. Features include registration, ticketing, live chat, virtual breakout rooms, trivia, polls, and on-demand user data. Our full service event production team will assist you in crafting the pristine video content. Perfect for virtual conferences, fundraisers, online education, live streaming, hosting premium content, Learning Management System, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 sales meeting platform used to cut down ramp time, boost sales productivity and increase close rates.
similar_products.features:
Demodesk is the meeting platform built specifically for sales. We empower customer-facing reps to become top performers by guiding them in real-time, automating non-selling tasks and engaging customers on a whole new level. 

Our breakthrough screen sharing technology makes meetings truly interactive.

Leading SaaS companies are using Demodesk to cut down ramp time, increase quota attainment, lift sales productivity, and accelerate growth.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
similar_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes. Bizzabo was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New York and Tel-Aviv.

similar_products.short_desc: Schools use Parents Booking to schedule and host in-person and/or video meetings for parent-teacher conferences.
similar_products.features:
Parents Booking is used by thousands of schools around the world to connect millions of parents and teachers for in-person and/or timed video conversations.

Schools can try for free, and set up their parent-teacher conferences in minutes by connecting their school database and importing the required 'data' automatically.

Proven to increase your school's parent-teacher attendance and conversations, save money and save time, Parents Booking is the answer to all your 'parental engagement' needs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audio Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Presentation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Recording software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Recording tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Recording software allows users to take capture audio and video clips from their screens and other devices such as webcams. These media files can be edited, annotated, and converted to various formats, as well as uploaded to help businesses with training, tutorials, demos, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Sharing software allows presenters and meeting participants to share the screens of their computers with other participants' computers or with projecting devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Classroom software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Classroom tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Classroom Software allows teachers and instructors to engage with learners in an online setting. These products offer interactive whiteboards to share notes/lessons, attendance tracking, live chat, and breakout rooms to encourage collaboration between participants.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Webinar software allows companies to conduct and distribute interactive live and recorded promotional or educational video presentations to existing or potential customers.
